text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-SubstitutionCondition
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    NOSUBNo substitutionSubstitution is not permitted.
    UNCONDUnconditionalNo conditions are required.
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-Conditional
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-xSubstitutionConditionNoneOrUnconditional

name: SubstitutionCondition
title: SubstitutionCondition
description: Identifies what sort of change is permitted or has occurred between the item that was ordered/requested and the one that was/will be provided.
